item.title: Nahum 1
item.description:
Nahum Chapter 1

1 The Oracle of Nahum The Book of the Vision of Nahum Yahveh’s Anger Against Nineveh

2 Yahveh is an exclusive God that avenges with anger. He carries out vengeance on his adversaries; he stores up anger for his enemies.

3 He doesn’t get mad quick, but he does exert his power; he doesn’t let the guilty go free. He displays his power in storms and tornadoes; clouds are dust beneath his feet.

item.title: Nahum 2
item.description:
Nahum Chapter 2

1 Attackers are advancing to crush you, Nineveh. Man the ramparts, guard the road, muster your forces, get ready.

2 Yahveh is going to restore majesty to Jacob, splendor to Israel; because plunderers have stripped it and cut the branches off its grapevines.

3 The shields of the valiant flash red; the soldiers wear scarlet uniforms; the chariots glitter like steel as they muster into formation; they rattle their cypress spears.

item.title: Nahum 3
item.description:
Nahum Chapter 3

1 Misfortune awaits bloody Nineveh, filled with lies and pillage and plunder without limit.

2 Do you hear the crack of whips, rattling wheels, galloping horses, rushing chariots!?

3 Do you see cavalry charging, swords flashing, spears gleaming, many slain, piles of corpses, countless bodies, and people stumbling over them!?

4 That’s all because of your continual prostitution, that charming mistress of sorceries; you sell nations by your prostitution, countries by your sorceries. 5"I’m your enemy," Yahveh of hosts says; “I’ll pull your skirts up over your faces, and show the nations your nakedness, the kingdoms your disgrace.
